mapper.select: select * from ( select t.id_, t.proc_def_id_, t.proc_inst_id_, t.name_, t.create_time_, to_char(t.create_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createTime, to_char(t.form_key_) form_key_, to_char(p.business_key_) business_key_, to_char(a.name_) as type_text, (select to_char(v.text_) from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'subject' and v.proc_inst_id_ = t.proc_inst_id_) as subject, (select to_char(v.text_) from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'submitBy' and v.task_id_ = t.id_) as submitby, (select to_char(emergencyLevel) from rcm_project_info ri where ri.business_id = p.business_key_) as emergencyLevel from act_ru_task t, act_hi_procinst p, act_re_procdef a where t.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_ and p.proc_def_id_ = a.id_ and t.assignee_ = #{assignee} and a.key_ not in ('bulletin','noticeDecision','formalReview') union select t.id_, t.proc_def_id_, t.proc_inst_id_, t.name_, t.create_time_, to_char(t.create_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createTime, to_char('bulletin') form_key_, to_char(p.businessid) business_key_, to_char('其它需决策事项') type_text, (select bulletinname from rcm_bulletin_info where businessid=p.businessid) subject, (select name from sys_user where uuid=( select audituserid from rcm_bulletin_log where orderby=( select max(orderby) from rcm_bulletin_log where iswaiting='0' and executionid=p.executionid) and businessid=p.businessid)) submitby, '' emergencyLevel from act_ru_task t, rcm_bulletin_log p where p.taskid=t.id_ and p.auditstatus='9' and p.audituserid=#{assignee} union select t.id_, t.proc_def_id_, t.proc_inst_id_, t.name_, t.create_time_, to_char(t.create_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createTime, to_char('formalReview') form_key_, to_char(g.businessid) business_key_, to_char('正式评审') type_text, (select projectname from rcm_formalassessment_info where businessid = g.businessid) subject, (select name from sys_user where uuid = g.lastuserid) submitby, decode((select emergencylevel from rcm_formalassessment_info where businessid = g.businessid),null,'') emergencylevel from act_ru_task t,rcm_formalassessment_log g where g.taskid = t.id_ and t.proc_def_id_ like 'formalReview%' and g.auditstatus='9' and g.audituserid=#{assignee} union select t.id_, t.proc_def_id_, t.proc_inst_id_, t.name_, t.create_time_, to_char(t.create_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createTime, to_char('noticeDecision') form_key_, to_char(p.businessid) business_key_, to_char('决策通知书') type_text, (select project_name from rcm_project_info where business_id = (select projectformalid from rcm_noticedecision_info where businessid=p.businessid)) subject, (select name from sys_user where uuid = (select audituserid from rcm_noticedecision_log where orderby = (select max(orderby) from rcm_noticedecision_log where iswaiting = '0' and executionid = p.executionid) and businessid = p.businessid)) submitby, '' emergencyLevel from act_ru_task t, rcm_noticedecision_log p where p.taskid = t.id_ and p.auditstatus = '9' and p.audituserid = #{assignee} ) ta where 1=1 and ta.id_='${taskId}' and to_char(ta.create_time_,'yyyy-mm-dd')='${createTime}' and ta.emergencyLevel = '${emergencyLevel}' and ta.proc_def_id_ like '${processKey}%' order by ta.create_time_ desc

select ta.* from ( select p.business_key_, to_char(p.start_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as start_time_, to_char(p.end_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as end_time_, a.key_ as type_, a.name_ as type_text, a.category_ as form_key, p.proc_def_id_, p.proc_inst_id_, decode(p.end_time_, null, (select regexp_replace(listagg(to_char(t.name_), ',') within group(order by t.proc_inst_id_) , '([^,]+)(,\1)+', '\1') from act_ru_task t where t.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_), '结束') as phase, (select v.text_ from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'subject' and v.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_) as subject from act_hi_procinst p, act_re_procdef a where p.proc_def_id_=a.id_ and exists (select * from act_hi_taskinst t where t.assignee_ = '${assignee}' and t.proc_inst_id_=p.proc_inst_id_ and t.end_time_ is not null) and p.business_key_ is not null and a.name_ !='bulletin' order by p.start_time_ desc ) ta where 1=1 and ta.subject like '%${subject}%' and ta.type_ = '${processKey}' and phase='结束' and phase!='结束'

select u.NAME as userName, t.name_ as taskName, (select v.text_ from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'opinion' and v.task_id_ = t.id_) as opinion, to_char(t.start_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as startTime, to_char(t.end_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as endTime, (select v.text_ from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'emergencyLevel' and v.task_id_ = t.id_) as emergencyLevel from act_hi_taskinst t, sys_user u where t.proc_inst_id_ = #{processInstanceId} and t.assignee_ = u.UUID order by t.start_time_

select uniid, title, sender, depart,url,created, owner, type, status, record_status, priority from ( select ta.*, (decode(ta.status,'1',ta.form_key_,a.category_) || '/' || p.business_key_ || '@' || p.proc_def_id_ || '@' ||p.proc_inst_id_ || '@' || ta.uniid) as url, to_char(ta.created_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, nvl(decode(pri.text_, '一般', '1', '紧急', '2', '特急', '3', ''),1) as priority, subject.text_ as title, cu.NAME as sender, cu.depart from (select t.proc_def_id_, t.proc_inst_id_, t.id_ as uniid, t.end_time_ as created_, t.assignee_ as owner, '1' as type, '2' as status, '2' as record_status, '' as form_key_ from act_hi_taskinst t where t.id_ = '${preTaskId}' union select t.proc_def_id_, t.proc_inst_id_, t.id_ as uniid, t.create_time_ as created_, t.assignee_ as owner, '1' as type, '1' as status, '1' as record_status, to_char(t.form_key_) as form_key_ from act_ru_task t where t.id_ in (${currentTaskIds})) ta, (select v.text_, v.task_id_ from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'emergencyLevel') pri, (select v.text_, v.proc_inst_id_ from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'subject') subject, act_re_procdef a, act_hi_procinst p, view_user_dep cu where ta.proc_def_id_ = a.id_ and ta.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_ and ta.uniid = pri.task_id_(+) and ta.proc_inst_id_ = subject.proc_inst_id_ and p.start_user_id_ = cu.UUID )
